about_the_game:
In the trial version, we have prepared the most basic game content, including:
- You can get & use some basic items.
- You can discover some basic cubes.
- You can play the newbie tutorial, classic mode.

Through this content, you can quickly understand the core gameplay of the game, after which you will be able to decide whether to experience all the content in the full version.

In the full version, you can experience more rich item, blocks, game modes.
Also, achievements and leaderboards waiting for you!
